text: Products in Araki’s PIPa line were functionally innovative and aesthetically pleasing housewares geared toward upmarket consumers. These included desk calendars, ceramic coffee drippers and pots, brightly colored ashtrays, and desk organizers, all made in Japan and sold at high-end stores like Bloomingdale’s and Georg Jensen.
